reviewtext: I've had three pair of these now, going on nearly 10 years.  The only reason I've replaced my previous two pair was because I lost them!  One in a seatback on a plane.  They're quite durable.  The winding case helps avoid the usual wire failures.  The sound is good, not great, but I'm fine with making the trade for durability and convenience.  I laid in a second set as a spare for when I eventually lose them again!
